main.name: Benito Gonzalez
main.description: Web Developer. Fashion Merchandiser. Dog Dad.
main.bio: Full Stack Web Developer with a background in retail management and fashion merchandising. Efficient at creating uniquely styled web applications with a clean user interface. Brings creativity and attention to detail to all projects in-store and on the web.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to drop me a message below!

resume.skillmessage: Here are a few things I know how to do:

education.description: A Full Stack Development bootcamp that covered React, JS, Node, MySql, jQuery, HTML, and more.

work.title: District Supervisor
work.description: Oversees the management of 8 different Ragstock locations in the Midwest. Works closely with company buyers and visuals team to stay on-trend and create new merchandising ideas sent company wide.

projects.title: Yoke Chat
